title: Outstanding  Comm Ave large studio with high ceilings  and archways
posting_body: Large studio w/ discrete sleeping alcove & is available in one of the most desirable classic brownstones on picturesque Commonwealth Ave in Back Bay.
Recessed lighting has been added since professional pics were taken.

The foyer leads to oversized living area with high ceilings creating a true sense of openness and features a/c, gleaming hardwood floors,bay windows, beautiful archways,numerous closets, full sized appliances in separate kitchen and full bathroom with tub.
Enjoy beautiful views of The Prudential &Commonwealth Ave Mall from the common roof- deck.
Graduate students welcome with co- signor  ( cannnot permit undergrads nor pets).
Sept 1 .Around the corner to Newbury and Boylston Streets, T, Eataly , easy access to The Charles, Cambridge, Beacon Hill, The Common, Downtown.1 month broker fee from incoming tenant.
